conclusion: Understanding how shadow position and size change with light source movement
Shadow A is cast by a small object (possibly a cake) on the left
Shadow B is cast by a small object (possibly a card) on the top right
Shadow C is cast by a roll of tape on the bottom left
Shadow D is cast by a soccer ball on the bottom right
Light source is moved to the right and above the objects
Shadow A will shift to the right; size depends on light source distance and angle
Shadow B will shift to the right; size depends on light source distance and angle
Shadow C will shift to the right; size depends on light source distance and angle
Shadow D will shift to the right; size depends on light source distance and angle
All shadows A, B, C, and D will shift to the right after light source moves
Final answer: Shadows will shift to the right; size depends on light source position and angle
